title: FROM NEURAL NETWORKS TO DEEP NEURAL NETWORKS
excerpt: The origins of neural networks date back to attempts to find a mathematical representation for information processing in human brains.(McCulloch and Pitts, 1943). The brain far exceeds the capabilities of modern engineering devices in many information processing  ...

title: Deep learning in neural networks: An overview
excerpt: Abstract In recent years, deep artificial neural networks (including recurrent ones) have won numerous contests in pattern recognition and machine learning. This historical survey compactly summarizes relevant work, much of it from the previous millennium. Shallow  ...
